name: Go Dungeon - A Text Adventure Game
name_original: Go Dungeon - A Text Adventure Game
description:
Explore the dungeon by typing in your actions (verb + noun)

Use full-screen mode for the best results. You can find the button to do so in the bottom right corner.

A fast and simple prototyping project that allowed me to put some new architecture concepts in Unity to use. An homage to the original adventure game, Colossal Cave Adventure by Will Crowther, I'm pretty happy with the result. All the (scripting) building blocks exist to make something far deeper and richer if there's any interest in me doing so.

Hint: Try the following key words: 

  • Go
  • Use
  • Examine
  • Take
  • Inventory
